Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
We are sensing that you have not completed the task. It is a shame that it had to come to this, but your efforts are no longer needed. Make sure not to disappoint again.
我们感觉到你并未完成任务。很遗憾会变成这样，但我们已经不需要你的帮助了。不要再让我们失望。

We are being eaten alive, our branches are stripped bare, sap is spilling out of open wounds. There is pain with every cut these animals inflict. Our fruits and nectar are freely available, yet this is not enough for some. Return our nutrients by committing the plant-eaters’ bodies to the ground.
我们被怪物活吞了下去，树枝也都被扒了个精光，汁液从裂口处汩汩地往外淌着。这些怪物划出的每一道伤口都疼痛不已。虽然我们的水果和花蜜还有不少，但还远远不够。干掉那些吞食植物的怪物，把我们的营养物抢回来。
"plant-eaters" refers to the Hopperhounds in the quest.
The plague has been halted. We will recover by feeding upon the nourishment from the plant-eaters' bodies. Our gratitude.
蝗灾已经控制住了，那些怪物尸体上的营养物会帮助我们恢复过来。感谢。
The plague has been halted. We will recover by feeding upon the nourishment from the plant-eaters bodies. Our gratitude.

A group of mechanized apes is expelling noxious fumes near our spawning grounds. Fresh green leaves shrivel on their approach, killing off new sprouts. We shudder to think about the kind of environment these creatures came from. Purge the sector of these belching meat bags.
一群机械猿猴正在我们的生长地附近散播有毒的气体。凡是它们所到之处，新鲜的绿叶全都枯萎，嫩芽也被扼杀。一想到这些生物之前所处的环境，我们就不寒而栗。去把这片区域中那些四处喷毒的肉袋消灭掉。
Fresh air once again! Our younglings blossom in gratitude.
新鲜的空气回来了！幼苗又能继续蓬勃生长了，感谢。

We have lost touch with an area of ourselves - our links have been severed. A sense of cut-off panic now lingers in our crippled connections. Many cycles ago, we lost touch with large parts of the world in similar strain. A myriad of places, blinking out of existence. Find out who severed our roots and eliminate them.
我们与一片区域的同胞失去了联系，我们之间的连接被彻底切断了。残破不堪的连接里如今只剩下中断时的恐慌。在许多个周期前，我们曾与世界上大片区域的同胞都失去了联系，情况和这很相似，无数地区眨眼之间消失不见。找出切断我们根须的罪魁祸首并消灭他们。
The root cutters are gone, and our connection with the area is slowly restoring. Thank you for your efforts.
切断根须的罪魁祸首被消灭了，我们与那片区域的连接正在慢慢恢复。感谢你的帮助。
A terrible blight is spreading through our earths. A false symbiont has emerged, set on making us part of its corruption. Halt this plague before it consumes the planet.
一场严重的疾病正在我们的土地上扩散。一个虚假的共生者冒了出来，强迫我们成为他堕落的一部分。在他吞噬整个星球前阻止这场疾病。
The blight has been contained, the horrid abominations slain. Now is the time for healing. Be thanked, Symbiont.
疾病已经被抑制住了，那可怕的东西也被消灭了。现在，我们需要时间恢复。感谢，共生者。
The Growth refer to the player as "Symbiont" as a title.
Build the Photovoltaic Panels for the Growth

Sonriel, the light-giver and life-bringer, is smiling upon you, {STR_LeaderName}. We know. We saw your kind grow and spread glittering foliage, using life-light from your devices. Our saplings touched by its echoing grace grew ever so bloomy. Will you share Sonriel’s gift and give us the foliage that lightens the night?
光之给予者和生命赋予者太阳神正向你微笑，{STR_LeaderName}。我们知道。我们曾看见过你们一族的人四处布置闪闪发亮的光板，并利用设备中的生命之光。我们的幼苗在接触到它发散的恩惠之后变得更加繁盛了。你可以给我们分享太阳神的恩赐并给予我们能够照亮夜晚的光板吗？
"Sonriel" refers to the name given by the Growth for the sun. They worship Sonriel as their god.
Be thanked, Symbiont. Sonriel now nurtures our saplings, even as he sleeps. You helped us blossom. We share the fruits.
感谢，共生者。现在即使是在太阳神睡觉时也能滋养我们的幼苗了。你帮助我们开出了花朵，我们会与你分享果实。
The Growth are photosynthetic by nature, and the ability to store sunlight using solar panels will allow them to store energy during night cycles.
灵植本身就具有光合作用，利用光板储存阳光能够使它们在夜晚也能储存能量。
Build the Greenhouse Parts for the Growth

The strength of the Mother Node and its saplings is linked to Sonriel’s eternal light. When he smiles upon us, we grow and blossom, and when he travels and sleeps, we falter and wither. We know the un-rooted kind can take many forms. The glassy carapaces your ancestors left behind intensify Sonriel’s light and let us bloom prolifically. Will you help us create more of those carapaces your kind calls a ‘greenhouse’?
母节点的力量及其幼苗与太阳神永恒的光芒相连。当他朝我们微笑，我们便会生长、开花，而当他离开和睡觉时，我们便会衰退、枯萎。我们知道没有根须的种族有着各种各样的形态。你们的祖先曾经留下的那些玻璃壳能够增强太阳神的光芒，让我们盛开得更加茂盛。你能帮助我们再建造一些你们称之为“温室”的那种保护壳吗？
Be thanked, Symbiont. You helped us blossom. We share the fruits.
感谢，共生者。你帮助我们开出了花朵，我们会与你分享果实。
The climate on this planet is not always optimal for the Growth, but greenhouses will provide them with superior conditions all year round.
这个星球的气候对灵植来说并不总是适宜的，但温室则能够全年为它们提供优质的环境。
The Only Good Bug is a Dead Bug
Ravenous carnivores with strange mutations are hunting the creatures vital to our ecosystem. They hunt in packs, killing the indigenous that live in our groves. Commence a culling.
一种身体发生过古怪异变的贪婪肉食动物正在捕食一种生物，它对于我们的生态系统至关重要。它们成群结队地出现并杀死那些居住在我们树林中的原住生物。干掉它们。
You have our thanks, Symbiont. The culling of those foul creatures has proved effective, and fauna has returned to our bosom.
感谢你，共生者。消灭那些污秽的生物很有效果，动物们又回到了我们的身边。
Between a Rock and a Hard Place

Our roots are ground between twisting rocks. In other places, the rocks glow and liquefy, depriving us of our nutrients. Stop these living rocks, and return their nutrients to the soil once again. This will not go unrewarded, Symbiont.
我们的根须扎在扭曲的岩石之间。有些地方的岩石会变成滚烫的液体，使我们失去了许多营养物。阻止那些活体岩石，将营养物再次带回到土壤中。你会得到报酬的，共生者。
We take root again. You have proven your worth, {STR_LeaderName}. Sonriel shine on you.
我们再一次扎根了，你已经证明了你的价值，{STR_LeaderName}。愿太阳神照耀你。
Research Tentacle Applications for the Growth

We aim to extend symbiosis to include your kind. For this to happen, we need to understand how we can spread the affection of the tentacle, the nectar and the sap. Will you help us with this research?
我们打算把共生关系扩展至你的族人。要想实现这一计划，我们需要了解我们应当如何传播根须、花蜜和汁液的影响。你能帮助我们进行这项研究吗？
Symbiont, our embrace can now only become closer. Thank you for this knowledge.
现在我们的联系变得越来越密切了，共生者。感谢你的研究。

The Growth want to initiate a study on how to better spread their symbiont affection via their tentacles. Can a tentacle help you drink your morning coffee? Maybe help read the newsfeed? Let's experiment!
灵植想要进行一项研究看看如何才能通过它们的根须更好地传播共生影响。也许根须能够在早晨帮你喝咖啡？也许还能帮助你读新闻？实验一下就知道了！
Research Interplanetary Sowing Methods for the Growth
为灵植研究跨星球播种方法

The Mother Node is fully grown and ready to launch the seed pod from this planet. But many suns ago, we lost all contact with the symbiosis of other worlds. We have lost our bearing. Help us calculate a trajectory so the solar winds lead us to fertile soil.
母节点已成长完全，准备从这个星球散播种荚了。不过，我们在很久以前就彻底失去了与其他世界的共生联系。我们已经失去了方向，帮助我们计算轨道，好让太阳风带领我们去往肥沃的土地。
Our seed pod is on its way to a new world. Be thanked, Symbiont.
我们的种荚已经在去往新世界的路上了。感谢你，共生者。
The Growth spread by sending their massive seeds to other worlds, launched by the Mother Node. Help them calculate their seed launch trajectory.
灵植通过向其他世界散播母节点的种子不断扩散蔓延。帮助它们计算种子的传播轨道。
摧毁自主机械修剪单位

Despite our attempts to grow on their warm towers, these Autonom insist we cannot grow our vines on them. They need only strengthen their cables. We must grow over the high spots to receive Sonriel’s kiss. Destroy those that cut and clear away our vines.
尽管我们试图沿着他们温暖的高塔生长，但这些自主机械就是不让我们在上面生长藤蔓。他们的方法就是，加强一下电缆电压。我们必须向高处生长，这样才能感受到太阳神的亲吻。消灭那些剪断我们藤蔓的自主机械。
These Autonom will think twice before they send out their agents to cut back our growth, all thanks to you, {STR_LeaderName}. You have our regards.
这些自主机械肯定会重新考虑一下是否要再派人来剪断我们的藤蔓了。这一切都归功于你，{STR_LeaderName}，感谢。
阻止吃食植物的狂热者

Horrors! Their cruelty knows no end: cultists that boil our root nodules, consume our leaves and pluck our children from the vine to be sliced and slathered in sugary nectar for their delight. Every Growth tendril quivers at the horror of knowing there’s a cult of humanoids known simply by the appellation: Vegetarians.
真是可怕！那些狂热者的残忍简直永无止境：他们把我们的根瘤煮来吃，还嚼食我们的叶子，把我们的幼苗从藤蔓上拔下来切成片，再涂上厚厚的糖蜜享受。每个知道了这些可怕现象的灵植卷须都在恐惧中瑟瑟发抖，这些类人生物有一个简单的称呼：素食主义者。
Our leaves are tranquil upon the wind. We will never forget the horrors of this cuisine, but we recognize your contribution in eliminating them.
我们的枝叶终于在这场风暴中得以平静。我们绝不会忘记这道菜肴所带来的恐惧，不过我们认可你的贡献，感谢你消灭他们。
更改污水排向，为灵植提供肥料

We sense tasty emissions coming from your dwelling places. This thing you call sewage, we want it. Can you send it this direction? We hunger for your delicious extractions. Clearly we are meant to live together in symbiosis.
我们感觉到有美味的排放物从你们的居住地那边排放出来。你们称为下水道的那个东西，我们也想要。你能把下水道的排向改到我们这边来吗？我们十分渴望那些可口的排放物。显然我们之间注定是要维持共生关系共同生存的。
We thank you for your delicious and precious sewage. We are glad you will share it with us. We love it. We are meant to be together.
感谢你为我们提供美味珍贵的排放物。很高兴你能与我们分享，我们很满意。我们注定是要在一起的。
Complete this special production task by collecting, packaging and distributing your city sewage to the Growth, which desire to feast upon this precious fertilizer.
为灵植收集、包装、分配你城市中的污水来完成这一特殊的生产任务，它们正期待得到这些宝贵的肥料。
Create a Sonic Pest Repellant Device.
建造一个声波驱虫设备。
A play on the saying,"Leave us alone".

A strangely likeable traveling man of diminutive stature told us that you could invent the technology to create a pest repellant device. He said that most creatures do not like ultrasonic sounds. We want this device to protect our mother nodes. Please provide them.
一位身材矮小但却惹人喜爱的旅行者告诉我们，你能够发明一种技术来建造声波驱虫设备。他说大多数生物都不喜欢超声波的声音，我们想用这种设备保护我们的母节点。帮助我们建造这种设备。
We thank you for your generosity and ingenuity. You are truly a master of this world and blessed by Sonriel. Please accept our bounty.
感谢你的慷慨和才能，你可真是这个世界的主人，太阳神一定赐予了你祝福。请收下我们的奖赏。
They may be conscious, but the Growth are still plants. Giving them a repellant against the planet's fauna will aid them greatly.
尽管灵植有意识，但它们始终还是植物。为它们建造一个驱虫设备来抵御星球上的各种生物将会起到很大的帮助。
Pods refer to the Growths botanics.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Criminals are stealing our essence, most alarming they steal our seed pods. Many a friend has died. So sad. Always the same. Their innards cored out to harvest our precious seeds for their terrible appetite.
犯罪分子正在窃取我们的精华，最可怕的是他们偷走了我们的种荚。许多朋友去世了。很伤心。总是这样。他们取出了它们的内脏，拿走了我们珍贵的种子来满足他们可怕的欲望。
Symbiont refers to the name given to the player by the Growth.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
We thank you for destroying the Pirate slaughterhouse. We know you, fine Symbiont, and consider you a friend.
感谢你摧毁了海盗的屠宰场。我们认识你，共生者，我们把你当作好朋友。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
A play on the saying, "Vengeance is mine".
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Destroy the nest built from Growth bodies.
摧毁使用灵植身体建成的巢穴。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

We demand action! They came from the skies, tore our saplings out by the roots, weaving them into their nests! Murderers used our dried bodies as their shelter! Who would do that? Surely you will avenge our loss!
我们需要反击！他们从天而降，把我们的幼苗连根拔起，然后用它们建成巢穴！这些凶手用我们的干枯的尸体作为他们的庇护所！怎会有人做出这种事情？你一定会为我们报仇的！
Flying creatures are using the Growth to build their nests.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
We thank you profusely for destroying the creatures that slew our saplings. You have proven yourself a friend to the Growth.
非常感谢你消灭了摧毁我们幼苗的生物，你已证明了自己是灵植的朋友。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Build Sprinkler Pipes to Irrigate the Growth
建造洒水管道来浇灌灵植
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

We hear of your ingenuity and desire that your farmers share your irrigation technology. Our attempts to irrigate have less delicacy, and we feel the nutrients wash away as our roots are flooded. We will grow thankful if you keep us moist and nourished using misting sprinklers.
我们听说过你们的聪明才智，希望你们的农夫能够与我们分享灌溉的技术。我们的灌溉总是少了些火候，当我们的根须被水淹没时，我们感觉营养都被冲走了。如果你能够用洒水器滋润我们，为我们补充养分，我们会感激不尽的。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Growth vines stretch across fields and we drink deep in the cool waters of your technology. We thank you for your generosity. Our leaves will provide your offspring with shelter for centuries to come.
灵植藤蔓遍布在田野上，我们深饮着由你们的技术带来的清凉之水。感谢你的慷慨大方，我们的叶子将为你们的后代提供未来几百年的庇护所。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Build the Growth an Irrigation System
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Complete this special production task by building sprinkler pipes and deploying them for the Growth to irrigate their lands with increased efficiency.
建造洒水管道并为灵植部署管道，以更高效地方式浇灌它们的土地，完成此特殊的生产任务。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

The Growth are a sentient botanical species. They speak poetically, using puns and metaphors to describe things and speak romantically. They use the word "symbiosis" to refer to their relationships with other races and species. The "Mother Node" is their leader, and they refer to her in such.
